member.name: T:eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.IAttributesMaster
member.summary: Defines object to assist developers to easily integrate eBay attributes feature.

member.name: M:eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.IAttributesMaster.NameValuesToAttributeSets(eBay.Service.SDK.Util.IKeyValueCollection)
member.summary: Extract IAttributeSetCollection object from IKeyValueCollection object.
member.param: The IKeyValueCollection to be converted.

member.name: M:eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.IAttributesMaster.RenderHtml(eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.IAttributeSetCollection,eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.IErrorSetCollection)
member.summary: Render HTML text by specifying list of AttributeSet.
member.param: List of AttributeSet objects.
The IErrorSetCollection object returned by Validate method. Set to null if you don't have one.
member.returns: The generated HTML text that is encapsulated in HTML table element.

member.name: M:eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.IAttributesMaster.RenderHtml(eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.IAttributeSetCollection,MSXML2.DOMDocument30,eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.IErrorSetCollection)
member.summary: Render HTML text by specifying list of AttributeSet and xsl Document.
member.param: List of AttributeSet objects.
Xsl Document
The IErrorSetCollection object returned by Validate method. Set to null if you don't have one.
member.returns: The generated HTML text that is encapsulated in HTML table element.

member.name: M:eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.IAttributesMaster.RenderHtmlForPostback(eBay.Service.SDK.Util.IKeyValueCollection,eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.IErrorSetCollection)
member.summary: Render HTML text by raw name-value pairs that you got during HTML submit.
member.param: List of name-value pairs from submit of attributes HTML form generated by all these RenderHtml methods.
The IErrorSetCollection object returned by Validate method. Set null if you don't have one.
member.returns: The generated HTML text that is encapsulated in HTML table element.

member.name: M:eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.IAttributesMaster.Validate(eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.IAttributeSetCollection)
member.summary: Validate IAttributeSetCollection object against eBay Attributes rules. IErrorSetCollection.Count == 0 means validation succeeded. Otherwise means failure and you have to call the above RenderHtml... methods and pass in the IErrorSetCollection object to re-generate Attributes HTML text that contains all the error messages.
member.param: The IAttributeSetCollection object which you want to validate.
member.returns: The returned IAttributeSetCollection object. IAttributeSetCollection == 0 means validation succeeded.

member.name: M:eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.IAttributesMaster.ConvertAttributeSetArray(eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.IAttributeSetCollection)
member.summary: Convert attribute set array to the format of ItemType for AddItemCall.
member.param: The attribute set list generated by AttributeMaster.
member.returns: The converted array that is compatible with ItemType in AddItemCall.

member.name: M:eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.IAttributesMaster.JoinItemSpecificAndSiteWideAttributeSets(eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.IAttributeSetCollection,eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.IAttributeSetCollection)
member.summary: Creates an array of AttributeSet objects which contains item specific attribute sets and site wide attribute sets with the exception of the attribute set for return policy.
member.param: IAttributeSetCollection
IAttributeSetCollection
member.returns: Joined collection of of item specific attributes sets and site wide attribute sets, except Return Policy

member.name: M:eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.IAttributesMaster.GetItemSpecificAttributeSetsForCategories(eBay.Service.Core.Soap.Int32Collection)
member.summary: Returns collection of item specific AttributeSet objects for an array category Ids. Each element of the array contains a VCS Id, if it exists for a given category Id.
member.param: int[]
member.returns: Collection of item specific AttributeSet objects

member.name: M:eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.IAttributesMaster.GetReturnPolicyAttributeSet(eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.IAttributeSetCollection)
member.summary: Extracts AttributeSet object for Return Policy from site wide attribute sets.
member.param: IAttributeSetCollection

member.name: M:eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.IAttributesMaster.GetSiteWideAttributeSetsForCategories(eBay.Service.Core.Soap.Int32Collection)
member.summary: Returns collection of Site Wide AttributeSet objects for a given array category Ids. Each element of the array contains a VCS Id, if it exists for a given category Id.
member.param: int[]
member.returns: Collection of site wide AttributeSet objects

member.name: T:eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.AttributesXslDownloader
member.summary: Implements IAttributesXslProvider. It gets XSL data by calling eBay API.

member.name: M:eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.AttributesXslDownloader.DownloadXsl
member.summary: Download XSL text from eBay by calling eBay API.

member.name: M:eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.AttributesXslDownloader.DownloadXsl(eBay.Service.Core.Sdk.ApiContext)
member.summary: Download XSL text from eBay by calling eBay API.
member.param: The ApiContext object to make API call.

member.name: T:eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.AttributesXmlDownloader
member.summary: Implements IAttributesXmlProvider. It gets CS xml data by calling eBay API. This implementation does not support catalog.

member.name: T:eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.IAttributesXmlProvider
member.summary: Supplies attributes XML for IAttributesMaster. The implementation of IAttributeXmlProvider should handle AttributeSet objects that has valid AttributeSet.ProductId nd return attributes with pre-filled product information for them.

member.name: M:eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.IAttributesXmlProvider.GetCSXmlText(eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.AttributeSet)
member.summary: Get CharacteristicSet(CS) xml. Set AttributeSet.ProductId to retrieve CSXml with pre-filled product information.
member.param: Identification information about the CS for which you want to get CSXml. You only need to set CS.CSId and, optionally, you can set CS.ProductId if you want to get the CSXml that is associated with specific product information. Set CS.CSId to 0 to get entire CharacteristicSet xml for all CSs.
member.returns: The xml text of the CS.

member.name: M:eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.IAttributesXmlProvider.GetMultipleCSXml(eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.IAttributeSetCollection)
member.summary: Get xml that contains multiple CSs. Only set AttributeSet.CSId and AttributeSet.ProductId (optional). Set AttributeSet.ProductId to retrieve CSXml with pre-filled product information.
member.param: List of AttributeSet objects for which you want to get CSXml.
member.returns: The CS xml for specified CSs.

member.name: M:eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.IAttributesXmlProvider.GetMultipleCSXmlText(eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.IAttributeSetCollection)
member.summary: Get xml that contains multiple CSs. Only set AttributeSet.CSId and AttributeSet.ProductId (optional). Set AttributeSet.ProductId to retrieve CSXml with pre-filled product information.
member.param: List of AttributeSet objects for which you want to get CSXml.
member.returns: The CS xml text for specified CSs.

member.name: M:eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.IAttributesXmlProvider.DownloadXml
member.summary: Get CS xml data by calling eBay API.

member.name: M:eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.IAttributesXmlProvider.DownloadXml(eBay.Service.Core.Sdk.ApiContext)
member.summary: Get CS xml data by calling eBay API.
member.param: The ApiContext object to make API call.

member.name: F:eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.AttributesXmlDownloader.OverridesName
member.summary: Name of the XSL Overrides node.

member.name: F:eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.AttributesXmlDownloader.GlobalSettingsName
member.summary: Name of the XSL GlobalSettings node.

member.name: M:eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.AttributesXmlDownloader.DownloadXml
member.summary: Get CS xml data by calling eBay API.

member.name: M:eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.AttributesXmlDownloader.DownloadXml(eBay.Service.Core.Sdk.ApiContext)
member.summary: Get CS xml data by calling eBay API.
member.param: The ApiContext object to make API call.

member.name: M:eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.AttributesXmlDownloader.GetCSXmlText(eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.AttributeSet)
member.summary: Get CharacteristicSet(CS) xml. This implementation does not support catalog, i.e., csInfo.ProductId will be ignored.
member.param: Identification information about the CS for which you want to get CSXml. You only need to set CS.CSId and, optionally, you can set CS.ProductId if you want to get the CSXml that is associated with specific product information. Set CS.CSId to 0 to get entire CharacteristicSet xml for all CSs.
member.returns: The xml text of the CS.

member.name: M:eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.AttributesXmlDownloader.GetMultipleCSXmlText(eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.IAttributeSetCollection)
member.summary: Get xml that contains multiple CSs. Only set AttributeSet.CSId and AttributeSet.ProductId (optional).
member.param: List of AttributeSet objects for which you want to get CSXml.
member.returns: The CS xml text for specified CSs.

member.name: M:eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.AttributesXmlDownloader.GetMultipleCSXml(eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.IAttributeSetCollection)
member.summary: Get xml that contains multiple CSs. Only set AttributeSet.CSId and AttributeSet.ProductId (optional).
member.param: List of AttributeSet objects for which you want to get CSXml.
member.returns: The CS xml for specified CSs.

member.name: M:eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.AttributesXmlDownloader.ExtractCSFromXml(System.Xml.XmlDocument,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Extract CS xml by CSId from combined CS Xml document.
member.param: The CS Xml document that contains multiple CS Xml.
Id of the CS that you want to get Xml for. Set to null to return xml for all CS.
Copy Overrides node or not..
member.returns: The new generated Xml document that contains the specified CS Xml.

member.name: M:eBay.Service.SDK.Attribute.AttributesXmlDownloader.ExtractMultiCSFromXml(System.Xml.XmlDocument,eBay.Service.Core.Soap.Int32Collection,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Extract CS xml by list of CSId from combined CS Xml document.
member.param: The CS Xml document that contains multiple CS Xml.
List of CSIDs that you want to get Xml for. Set to null to return xml for all CS.
Copy Overrides node or not..
member.returns: The new generated Xml document that contains the specified CS Xml.
